function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of risk assessment and management in building services maintenance","Impact":"Unsatisfactory results, poor maintenance, and high risk in building services availability","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough risk assessments before full implementation of a design, employing prediction theories and tools for reliability evaluation of engineering systems","Technologies":"Reliability evaluation tools, predictive modeling, risk assessment software","People":"Engineers, building service maintenance staff","Owner":"Management, engineering teams"},{"Description":"Lack of systemic study on COVID-19 response in the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate prevention and mitigation measures against COVID-19 transmission in buildings","Mitigation":"Conducting systematic studies on the methodology of active COVID-19 response in the built environment, implementing effective prevention and mitigation measures","Technologies":"COVID-19 transmission modeling, building ventilation and air filtration technology","People":"Facilities managers, building occupants","Owner":"Facilities management organizations, professional bodies"},{"Description":"Insufficient knowledge and guidance on combating COVID-19 in facilities management","Impact":"Ineffective response to COVID-19 transmission in buildings, increased risk of infection among building occupants","Mitigation":"Providing comprehensive guidance on prevention and mitigation measures, training facilities management staff on effective COVID-19 response","Technologies":"COVID-19 prevention protocols, building sanitation technology, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Facilities management staff, building occupants","Owner":"Facilities management organizations, public health authorities"}]}
